reports.title: The Reccomendations Dashboard
reports.query:
The *Recommendations Database* is an extension of the *Movies Database*, a great way to get to know Neo4j and Cypher. This graph contains the following data:
- `Person` nodes with nine properties (`name`, `born`, `born`, `died`, etc...).
- `Movie` nodes with seventeen properties (`title`, `plot`, `released`, `imdbRating`, etc...).
- `User` nodes with three properties (`degree`, `name`, `userId`).
- `Genre` nodes with two properties (`degree`, `name`).
- `Actor` and `Director` nodes that are subsets of the `Person` nodes.
- Two relationship types between `Person` and `Movie` (`ACTED_IN`,  `DIRECTED`).
- One relationship types between `User` and `Movie` (`RATED`).
- One relationship types between `Genre` and `Movie` (`IN_GENRE`).
- One relationship type between different `Movie` nodes - `SIMILAR_JACCARD`.

This dashboard uses the sample dataset from the Neo4j developer guide.
[https://neo4j.com/developer/example-data/](https://neo4j.com/developer/example-data/)

____


You will find two pages in this same dashboard:
1. An **Overview** page with general info about the graph.
3. An **Person view** page that lets you drill down on a specific person.

To inspect the Cypher behind each of the visualizations, click the (â‹®) button on the top right of a report. This lets you see and edit the query.

reports.title: Relationship types
reports.query:
MATCH ()-[r]->()
RETURN type(r) as Relationship, COUNT(r) as Total

reports.title: Browse the movies
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Movie)
RETURN m.title as Movie, m.released as Year

reports.title: Movies with most actors
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[:ACTED_IN]-(p:Person)
RETURN m.title as Movie, COUNT(p) as Actors
ORDER BY Actors
DESC LIMIT 10

reports.title: Movies by decade
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Movie)
with toInteger(substring(m.released,0,4))/10*10 as Year, COUNT(m) as Total
where Year is not null
return Year, Total
ORDER BY Year ASC

reports.title: Customized, grouped bar chart
reports.query:
MATCH (m:Movie)<-[r]-(p:Person)
WHERE m.title CONTAINS "Matrix"
RETURN 
m.title as Movie, 
type(r) as Role, 
COUNT(p) as People

reports.title: Select a person
reports.query:
MATCH (p:Person)--(m:Movie)
WHERE p.name is not null
RETURN p.name as Person, COUNT(m) as Movies 
ORDER BY Movies DESC

reports.title: Graph view for this person
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:Person)--()
WHERE p.name = $neodash_person_name
RETURN path

reports.title: About this page
reports.query: On this page, you can select a person from a table, and dynamically view other visualizations update.

reports.title: Movies for the selected person
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p)-->(m:Movie)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_person_name
RETURN m.title as Movie, m.tagline as Tagline, m.released as Released

reports.title: The highest voted movies for this person
reports.query:
MATCH path=(p:Person)--(m:Movie)
WHERE p.name = $neodash_person_name
RETURN p, apoc.create.vRelationship(p, "IN", {weight: m.imdbRating}, m), m
